timeline.message: feat(lerna): Added LernaDetectable.
feat(lerna): Started Lerna extraction.
refactor(lerna/yarn/npm): Refactored LernaDetectable to be less complex. Refactored Yarn and Npm to provide more utility to the LernaDetectable.
feat(lerna): Implemented package-lock.json and npm-shrinkwrap.json support.
refactor(lerna): Created LernaPackageDiscoverer for separation of concerns and testability.
fix(lerna): Added package location to the code location so they can be distinguished.
feat(lerna): Added root project extraction and project info.
refactor(lerna): Removed unused package.json.
refactor(lerna/yarn/npm): Added middle layer between extraction classes and real work.

Merge branch 'master' into lerna

# Conflicts:
#	build.gradle
#	detectable/src/main/java/com/synopsys/integration/detectable/factory/DetectableFactory.java
#	docs/templates/content/advanced/BD-user-role-requirements.ftl
refactor(yarn): YarnOptions are now a dependency of the YarnLockExtractor.
refactor(lerna/yarn/npm): Made Packager layer more testable.
feat(lerna): Added a property for including private Lerna packages.
doc(lerna): Added RN and doc page for Lerna.
fix(lerna): Lerna was not including the root code location.
fix(lerna): Made LernaPackageDiscoverer more resilient to gson parsing.
style(license): Added license headers
test-feat(lerna): Added LernaDete.ctableTest
test-feat(lerna): Added LernaPackageDiscovererTest.

Merge branch 'master' into lerna

# Conflicts:
#	detectable/src/main/java/com/synopsys/integration/detectable/factory/DetectableFactory.java
#	src/main/java/com/synopsys/integration/detect/tool/detector/impl/DetectDetectableFactory.java
refactor(lerna): Merged master into Lerna branch.
refactor(yarn): Removed finals.

timeline.author: taikuukaits

timeline.bodyText: I think it's weird we use Optional and Nullable, we should pick one.
timeline.author: taikuukaits

Merge branch 'master' into lerna

style(todo): Documented technical debt with TODOs.
